Topic.Title: Gamebook - words that cause sound to play

Posts.EditableText: I'm writing a game for language learning I want that if a player clicks a certain word, a file that pronounces that word would be played out. Is this possible in a gamebook? Because I noticed not muh is written as far as gamebook tutorials go What's the word?
